title: A Night at the Opera 30th Anniversary Coll. Ed
description:
A Night at the Opera (30th Anniversary Coll. Ed) [CD/DVD Combo] [COLLECTOR'S EDITION] [ORIGINAL RECORDING REMASTERED]

A landmark release, this special edition features both the new CD and DVD formats of the album completely restored from original analogue tapes and digitally re-mastered by Bob Ludwig, in both stereo and 5.1 surround sound. As well as the original 1975 videos for 'Bohemian Rhapsody' and 'You're My Best Friend', the DVD also contains brand new video footage for the other 10 tracks, along with archive audio commentary from all four members of Queen, including the late Freddie Mercury.

May explains: "This DVD also features for the first time visuals for every track on the album ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â­ some, like the original 'Bohemian Rhapsody' video, carefully digitally restored and re-graded, and some, like the stunning new video for 'Good Company', created especially for this release. There are also some special commentaries, ancient and modern, from all four Queen members on facets of the tracks, and... yes, this is quite simply the best 'Night At The Opera' ever produced. I doubt if it can ever be bettered!"
And for collector, the  Bohemian Rhapsody single.
